Based on the user preference cues and genre suggestions, I would recommend "Maleficent" and "Elysium" to the user.
Both movies are set in a futuristic world where technology has advanced significantly, resulting in an almost perfect world. However, this perfect world is threatened by a mysterious force that seems to be growing stronger with each passing day. In order to stop this mysterious force from destroying their perfect world, two unlikely heroes must band together and embark on an epic adventure filled with danger, excitement, and unforgettable moments.
"Maleficent" is a 2014 American fantasy film directed by Darren Aronofsky and written by Aronofsky, John Cusack, and Richard Jenkins. The film stars Angelina Jolie as Maleficent, a powerful fairy who seeks revenge against the humans who have brought her to justice.
"Elysium" is a 2013 American science fiction action film directed by James Cameron and written by Cameron, Andrew Wasmund, and Paul Kettle. The film stars Jason Statham as Jack "Cranky" Copelli, a former drug kingpin who seeks revenge against the government officials who have brought him to justice.
In both movies, the two unlikely heroes must band together and embark on an epic adventure filled with danger, excitement, and unforgettable moments.
